name: PALETTA
description:
After the king's death, the colors disappeared and the princess ran far, far away. Without a ruler, the people were left to wonder: "Who will save these dying lands?"

PALETTA is an atmospheric adventure game made with RPG Maker VX Ace for IGMC 2017.

Arrow keys: Movement
Shift: Hold to run
Space/Enter: Interact / Confirm 
Q&W: Switch between spells
A: Use/activate/deactivate spell / Skip text
ESC/X: Menu / Cancel
F5: Fullscreen
F6: Change screen size


The game autosaves over the first file. You can disable that from menu.

PETAL
Team Hero, Pixel Artist, Character Designer

PUPU 
Team Princess, Eventer, Artist, Writer

PALETTA is Team Cola's first finished game. We appreciate all the feedback we can get! Please report all the bugs and similar things to us.

We now have an RMN page! 

06/11/2018: The file below has been changed to the newest one (from around December 2017).
